import { FunctionComponent, useState } from "react"; import { Document, Page } from "react-pdf"; const PreviewPage: FunctionComponent = () => { const [numPages, setNumPages] = useState(0); const [pageNumber, setPageNumber] = useState(1); function onDocumentLoadSuccess() { setNumPages(numPages); } return (
{`HTML & CSS Preview`}

Page {pageNumber} of {numPages}

Number of PDFs generated:
1
Download 1 PDF
{/*
PDFs Downloaded
*/}
); }; export default PreviewPage;
